original_title: Derby Days Asturias: Real Oviedo vs Sporting Gijón
overview: We take to Spain to discover the incredibly unique rivalries that make up this obsessed football nation! This time it's Asturias, where we discovered two sets of fans whose love for their team, is only surpassed by their love for battling for their team. So after not playing for over 14 years, when they finally met, we experienced a match day arguably more chaotic than anything we've ever seen!
title: Derby Days Asturias: Real Oviedo vs Sporting Gijón
